onbon.y2.play
Class Area

java.lang.Object
  onbon.y2.play.Area
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnimationArea, ChiCalendarArea, ClockArea, CounterArea, DateTimeArea, MarqueeArea, PicArea, SensorTempArea, TextArea, TextualizeArea, VideoArea
public abstract class Area
extends java.lang.Object

The abstract area provides common functions to configure a area.

Author:
ONBON
